short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables screen sharing to Mezzanine for Mezz-In participants

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension enables users of the Mezz-In web application to share their screen during a Mezzanine session. The first time a user shares their screen, they will be prompted to permit use of this extension.
